mapper.update:
update t_s_order
wo_order_id = #{woOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_code = #{partnerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_key = #{appKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partner_order_id = #{partnerOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
product_code = #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oper_type = #{operType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
refund_order_id = #{refundOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_real_request_woplat = #{isRealRequestWoplat,jdbcType=TINYINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobilephone = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_channel = #{orderChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
valid_time = #{validTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
invalid_time = #{invalidTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_need_charge = #{isNeedCharge,jdbcType=TINYINT},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
allow_auto_pay = #{allowAutoPay},
redirect_url = #{redirectUrl},
update_time = now()
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_s_his_order ( order_id, wo_order_id, partner_code, app_key, partner_order_id, product_code, oper_type, refund_order_id, is_real_request_woplat, state, mobilephone, order_channel, create_time, update_time, valid_time, invalid_time, price, count, money, is_need_charge, remark, allow_auto_pay,redirect_url,copy_time2, copy_type, copy_remark ) (SELECT order_id, wo_order_id, partner_code, app_key, partner_order_id, product_code, oper_type, refund_order_id, is_real_request_woplat, state, mobilephone, order_channel, create_time, update_time, valid_time, invalid_time, price, count, money, is_need_charge, remark, allow_auto_pay,redirect_url ,now() , #{copyType} ,#{copyRemark} FROM t_s_order WHERE order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR});
